alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Grant; Noble (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Kay, northwestern Noble, southeastern Grant and northeastern Garfield Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 546 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tonkawa, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tonkawa, Billings and Ceres. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 195 and 216. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
